item.title: Artist's special
item.description: Ingredients 30 ml Scotch 30 ml Oloroso sherry 15 ml lemon juice 15 ml grenadine or redcurrant or raspberry syrup lemon twist Instructions Shake ingredients. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

item.title: Blood and sand
item.description: Ingredients 20 ml Scotch 20 ml blood orange juice 20 ml sweet vermouth 20 ml cherry liqueur orange zest cherry Instructions Shake ingredients. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a flamed orange zest and cherry.

item.title: Scotch and soda
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml Scotch 90 ml soda water Instructions Build in rocks glass over ice.
